dialogue: Madame Morrible?!
I am Galinda Upland. Of the Upper Uplands?
If this is regarding room assignments--
Oh, no... Thank you so much for asking, but I've already been assigned a private suite.
But you can of course come visit me whenever you want!
No, it's about my application to your sorcery seminar!
I do not teach my seminar every semester. Of course, if someone very special were to come along---
Well, naturally! Which is why I wanted to talk to you...
Magic is merely the mind's attempt to wrap itself around the impossible. Yes: I did that... ...to prepare you to expect th e unexpected here at Shiz.
She's blown away--
Did you visually see that? I simply must get into her seminar!
And speaking of the unexpected...
Morrible turns to Galinda and the other gi rls--
Which of you young ladies will volunteer to share with--
Madame Morrible--?
Oh, thank you dear. That is very good of you.
Wait, what?
Miss-- Elphaba, is it--? You can room with Miss Galinda!
Go now. All of you.
You. Come with me.
Well, of course!
No. Not you. You.
I shall tutor you privately. And take no other students. Now come.
You.
Me?
The rest of you can go on doing-- whatever this is.
Madame Morrible, you are-- no, seriously, I admire you so, soooo--
Enough.
A magic wand!? It's-- It's-- It's so small.
It's a training wand.
Oh, Madame-- how can I express my gratitution?! It is my heart's desire to become a sorceress. Thank you. For having faith in me!
I have no faith in you, dear. This was your roommate's idea, not mine.
I'm confused.
She did? But why?
I'm a sorceress, not a mind reader! I've no idea why! But I cannot risk losing her. So-- here I am.
My personal opinion, dear, is that you do not have-- what it takes. I hope you pr ove me wrong. I doubt you will.
You might want to thank her. She's on her way.
What?
Well, you invited her. I need a drink.
Oh no.
What did Madame Morrible just say?
My powers are purely meteorological. I can stop and start rain, make a bit of wind. But you, Dearie, I believe--
Your powers could be...
